articles.title: Godzilla vs. Kong’s bonkers battles pull from the best Godzilla movies - Polygon
articles.description: The Shōwa era of Toho Company’s Godzilla series stretches from the original 1954 movie through 1975’s Terror of Mechagodzilla, spanning 15 films. Those movies were bizarre and silly in a way more recent Godzilla movies, like Roland Emmerich’s version, ignored…
articles.content: By all accounts, Warner Brothers Godzilla vs. Kong is a hit, though how much of one is still a little murky. Still, a $49 million seven-day box-office total and a generally positive audience response… [+12190 chars]
